about.title: About Yaqeen
about.subtitle: Discover who we are
about.paragraph1: At Yaqeen, we have been leaders in investment and real estate development since August 1997. Our commitment to excellence has led us to deliver diverse projects, including raw land development, commercial real estate, and residential complexes.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to keep Yaqeen a symbol of reliability, high quality, and competitive prices, as we believe that excellence is the foundation of success.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Explore some of our outstanding real estate projects.

jada.title: Jada Al-Diriyah Project
jada.description: Located in the historic Diriyah area, the project reflects the cultural heritage of the region. It includes 76 unique residential units.

dana.title: Dana Al-Yasmeen Project
dana.description: A luxurious residential project featuring 16 exclusive villas, designed to provide a modern lifestyle with high-quality infrastructure.

dana-mokhatat.title: Al-Dana Master Plan Project
dana-mokhatat.description: In Al Kharj Governorate, we had a share in real estate development. Due to the development in infrastructure and population density, 17 residential villas were built and completely completed.

wadi.title: Villas Al-Wadi Project
wadi.description: Al-Wadi includes 6 luxurious villas with a modern design and complete facilities, offering an elegant and comfortable environment for families in a strategic and quiet location.

omara-derayaa.title: Omara Al-Diriyah Project
omara-derayaa.description: A modern residential project spanning 4,200 square meters and including 40 apartments distributed across two floors and a penthouse. Designed with a blend of authenticity and modernity to match the historical Diriyah atmosphere. Strategically located near King Khalid Road, the project reflects luxury and privacy, offering integrated facilities such as parking spaces, green areas, and shared service areas. It targets families and investors seeking a high-end and sustainable living environment in the heart of one of Riyadh's most significant heritage areas.

bn-gloy-road.title: The Kairouan Jewel Project
bn-gloy-road.description: A modern office-commercial project located on Bn-Gloy Road, spanning 20,700 square meters with a leasable area of 25,895 square meters. It features a strategic location on Bn-Gloy Road, a contemporary design that meets business needs, and provides integrated office and commercial spaces suitable for various activities.

waha.title: Al-Waha Master Plan Project
waha.description: Al-Waha Master Plan in Al-Kharj spans over 460,000 square meters and includes 49 blocks with more than 600 residential and commercial land plots of varying sizes. It features a strategic location and developed infrastructure, including road networks and integrated facilities, making it an ideal choice for living or investment.
